#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

const ll MOD = 1e9 + 7;
long long __gcd(long long a, long long b)
{
	long long c;
	while (a != 0) {
		c = a; a = b%a;  b = c;
	}
	return b;
}

ll C(ll n, ll r){
	if (r > n-r) r = n - r;
	ll c = 1;
	for (int k = 1; k <= r; k++)
	{
		ll g = __gcd(k, c);
		c /= g;
		c *= (n - k + 1) / (k / g);
	}
	return c;
	
}

int main(){
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--){
		ll n, k;
		cin >> n >> k;
		ll ans = C(n, k);
		ans %= MOD;
		for (int i = 2; i <= k; i++)
			ans *= i, ans %= MOD;
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
}
